entry.title: VPS Init Setup
entry.summary:
Configuring a VPS
Init:
Add your public key to VPS:
#In Local pbcopy < ~/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub
#In VPS nano ~/.ssh/authorized_keys # Add .pub content here
Update & Upgrade:
sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade
Check if reboot required:
ls /var/run/reboot-required
Change root pw: sudo su passwd

entry.summary:
